item.title: ZSH Cheat Sheet
item.description: zfs create -V 20GB my-pool/docker/blah mkfs.btrfs /dev/zvol/my-pool/docker/blah lxc config device add my-container docker disk source=/dev/zvol/my-pool/docker/blah path=/var/lib/docker
